#summary Plans for upcoming osgBullet releases

= v1.1 =

*Release date:* April-May 2010

*Status:* Release candidate available. Development is on the 1.1 branch.

This release will contain some compatibility with Bullet v2.76. You will need to build osgBullet with the CMake USE_COLLADA flag deselected. This will leave out the portions of osgBullet that require the old Bullet !ColladaConverter library.

= v2.0 =

*Release date: June-July 2010

*Status:* Not yet started.

This non-backwards compatible release will remove all portions of osgBullet that depend on the old Bullet !ColladaConverter library.
